name: Dog Fight (Ellis Horwood)
overview: Published in the book "Winning Games on the Commodore 64", in the German version "Das große Commodore-64-Spiele-Buch" and also in 75 Spill Datatronic. the dog fight takes you back to World War I and puts you in the cockpit of a biplane over the English Channel. Your job is to shoot down as many enemy aircraft as you can. Because ofhe prevailing wind, you have to be very accurate when targeting the enemy, and you may find you use as many as 30 bullets on one plane. Guide your sight over the plane and shoot like mad!!!
